tag_list: adops, online-advertising, linux, devops, system-administration, database
overview: After years of working as a web developer for companies such as Standard Interactive, Salespider.com, and Eloqua, James found his niche in online advertising with ArtsandTV.company. Bringing a high level of expertise in web languages and Linux system administration to the table, James has contributed greatly to the development of new ad server technologies. Most recently James has been focusing his development efforts on Project Sunblock and companion tools.
